Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 25.

BLHar116.Transcription:
A man may a while nature be gile By doctrine and loreAnd ȝut at
                    the ende wole nature home wynde There sche was be fore
BLHar116.Note:
One couplet, added to flyleaf by a hand of fifteenth-sixteenth
                    century.
BLHar116.Editions:
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 554.
